name: Matthew Gaudet
body:
I'm a graduate student at the [University of Alberta](https://www.cs.ualberta.ca), working on Transactional Memory systems. 

In general, my interests lie in the region just above hardware and below individual programmers-- Compilers and Runtime systems so far.  

### More of Me: 

- [My academic homepage](http://webdocs.cs.ualberta.ca/~mgaudet/)-- Includes links to publications
- [My twitter](https://twitter.com/mattstudies)
- Email me at [matt (char)0x40 mgaudet.ca](matt \(char\)0x40 mgaudet.ca)

### History 

I've worked on an [evaluation](http://dl.acm.org/citation.cfm?id=2370836) of the Transactional Memory system on [Blue Gene/Q](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Blue_Gene). 

I've also done small amounts of work in the area of outlier detection-- the publication of which is forthcoming.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
